definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
to visit a doctor/to see a patient

sentences.english: This article Legionella disease related to recent research carried out on the preliminary.
sentences.chinese: 本文就军团菌病有关研究近况进行了初步阐述。

sentences.english: Both groups of diseases are strongly associated with poverty.
sentences.chinese: 这两种病都与贫穷有很密切的联系。

sentences.english: The doctor diagnosed my illness as neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 医生诊断我的病是神经痛。

sentences.english: No positive reaction was found in both paragonimiasis and clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 与肺吸虫病和肝吸虫病患者血清之间未出现交叉反应。

sentences.english: And they are really rule out the disease.
sentences.chinese: 并且他们还被真治出病。

sentences.english: The disease has affected the lens of his left eye.
sentences.chinese: 这种病已经影响了他左眼的水晶体。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the curative effect and safety of dibutyl phthalate on demodicidosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灭蚴宁治疗蠕形螨病的效果及安全性。

sentences.english: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentences.chinese: 真菌剂浸泡种子来防止秧苗受病。

sentences.english: We unfortunately don't have a blood test or an X-ray to confirm it.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，我们没有血液测试或X光测试来证实这种病。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese Medicine Committee of Diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 中国中医药学会消渴病专业委员会。

sentences.english: This provides a laboratory way for diagnosing mulberry yellow dwarf disease.
sentences.chinese: 可作为桑黄化型萎缩病病株的实验诊断手段。

sentences.english: The effect of estrogens on fibrocystic breast disease (FBD) are controversial.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素对乳腺纤维囊性增生病的影响各家报道不一。

sentences.english: These deposits are one of the defining characteristics of Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.chinese: 这些沉积物是阿耳茨海默氏病的特征之一。

sentences.english: I don't know.Your mother wasn't ill.I saw her on Thursday and she was very well.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚，你的母亲没病，我周四见到她身体很好。

sentences.english: Cassava brown streak disease is a more destructive form of cassava mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 木薯褐条病是木薯花叶病中危害性较大的一种病。

definition: to fall ill/to contract a disease
